trans-unit.source: Represents a group of annotations.
trans-unit.target: 表示一組註解。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup> class represents a collection of annotations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup>類別代表附註集合。

trans-unit.source: This class can be used to manipulate annotations relative to each other.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別可用來操作相對於彼此的註解。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content alignment of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註釋的內容對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> value that represents the content alignment of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> 值，表示註解的內容對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to align text for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TextAnnotation>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.EllipseAnnotation> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation> objects, and to align a nonscaled image inside an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ImageAnnotation> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性用來對齊文字<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TextAnnotation>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.EllipseAnnotation>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation>物件，以及對齊 nonscaled 的映像內<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ImageAnnotation>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether an annotation anchor may be moved with a mouse by the end user.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定旗標，這個旗標指定註解錨點是否可以由使用者使用滑鼠來移動。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the annotation anchor may be moved, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果註解錨點可能已經移動則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether an annotation may be moved with a mouse by the end user.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定旗標，這個旗標指定註解是否可以由使用者使用滑鼠來移動。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the annotation may be moved, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果註解可能已經移動則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether the points of a polygon annotation may be moved with a mouse by the end user.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定旗標，這個旗標指定多邊形註解的點是否可以由使用者使用滑鼠來移動。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the points of the polygon annotation may be moved, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以移動多邊形註解的點則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether an annotation may be resized with a mouse by the end user.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定旗標，這個旗標指定註解是否可以由使用者使用滑鼠來調整大小。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the annotation may be resized, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果註解的大小可以調整則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether an annotation may be selected with a mouse by the end user.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定旗標，這個旗標指定註解是否可以由使用者使用滑鼠來選取。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the annotation may be selected, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果註解可以選取則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether an annotation's text may be edited when the end user double clicks the text.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定旗標，這個旗標指定當使用者按兩下註解文字時，是否可以編輯此文字。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the annotation text may be edited, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果註解文字可以編輯則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of annotations in the group.
trans-unit.target: 取得群組中註解的集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationCollection" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Note that the coordinates of all annotations in the group are relative to the group annotation.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，群組中所有註解座標相對於群組註解。

trans-unit.source: Gets the annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 取得註解類型。

trans-unit.source: The annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 註解類型。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to get the name of each annotation type, for example.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性用來取得每個註解類型名稱，例如。

trans-unit.source: Line, Rectangle, Ellipse, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 線條、 矩形、 橢圓形、 等等。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value used for the background of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值，用於註解的背景。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background gradient style of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的背景漸層樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle" /> value used to draw the background of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle" /> 值，用於繪製註解的背景。

trans-unit.source: Two colors are used to draw the gradient, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackSecondaryColor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 兩個色彩用來繪製漸層、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackSecondaryColor%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hatch style of an annotation background.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解背景的影線樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle" /> value used to draw the background of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle" /> 值，用於繪製註解的背景。

trans-unit.source: Two colors are used to draw the hatching, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackSecondaryColor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 兩個色彩用來繪製影線<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackSecondaryColor%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the secondary color for the background of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解背景的次要色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value used to draw the background with hatching or gradient fill.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值，用於繪製具有影線或漸層填滿的註解背景。

trans-unit.source: A secondary color is used with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackColor%2A> when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackHatchStyle%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackGradientStyle%2A> are used.
trans-unit.target: 次要色彩用於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackColor%2A>時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackHatchStyle%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackGradientStyle%2A>可用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the chart area to which the annotation is clipped.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖表區域的名稱，註解會裁剪至此圖表區域。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> that represents the name of an existing chart area.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="string" />，表示現有圖表區域的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If a chart area name is specified, the annotation will only be drawn inside the plotting area of that chart area.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定圖表區域名稱，則該圖表區域的繪圖區域內都會只繪製註解。

trans-unit.source: All parts of the annotation outside of the plotting area will be clipped.
trans-unit.target: 將裁剪的註解在繪圖區之外的所有部分。

trans-unit.source: To disable chart area clipping, set this property to <xref:System.Double.NaN> or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 若要停用圖表區域依附，請將此屬性設定為<xref:System.Double.NaN>或空字串。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> to release both unmanaged and managed resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="True" /> 表示釋放 Unmanaged 和 Managed 資源，<see langword="false" /> 表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases unmanaged and, optionally, managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 Unmanaged 和 Managed 資源 (後者為選擇性釋放)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font to use for the text of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要用於註釋文字的字型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> object used for the text of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 物件，用於註解的文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text color for an annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的文字色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value used for the text color of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值，用於表示註釋的文字色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that determines if an annotation is selected.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定旗標，這個旗標會判斷是否已選取註釋。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the annotation is selected, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已經選取註解則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether the size of an annotation is always defined in relative chart coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定旗標，這個旗標會指定是否一律以相對圖表座標來定義註解的大小。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Width" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Height" /> of an annotation are always in chart relative coordinates, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果註解的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Width" /> 與 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Height" /> 一定會以相對圖表座標表示，則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The height and width of an annotation may be set in relative chart or in axes coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 在相對的圖表或軸座標，可能設定的高度和寬度的註解。

trans-unit.source: By default, relative chart coordinates are used.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，會使用相對圖表座標。

trans-unit.source: To use axes coordinates, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.IsSizeAlwaysRelative%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用軸座標，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.IsSizeAlwaysRelative%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Then either anchor the annotation to a data point or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 然後請錨定至資料點或設定註解<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line color of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的線條色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value used to draw an annotation line.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值，用於繪製註解行。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line style of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的線條樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle" /> value used to draw an annotation line.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle" /> 值，用於繪製註解行。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line width, in pixels, of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的行寬 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="integer" /> value defining the width, in pixels, of an annotation line.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="integer" /> 值，定義註解行的寬度 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the annotation's shadow.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的陰影色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value used to draw the shadow of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值，用於繪製註解的陰影。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the annotation's shadow.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的陰影大小。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="integer" /> value that represents the offset between an annotation and its shadow.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="integer" /> 值，表示註解及其陰影之間的位移。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text style of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註釋的文字樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.TextStyle" /> enumeration value used to draw the text of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.TextStyle" /> 列舉值，用於繪製註解的文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether the annotation is visible.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定旗標，這個旗標表示註解是否可見。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the annotation is visible, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可看見註解則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
